description: "This map shows the empires, kingdoms and states of Southeast Asia. Its decorative cartouche features drawings of two women—one with a cornucopia and one with a censer (incense burner)—elephant heads, and a French coat of arms. Nine scales are shown."
title: "L' Asie : divisée en ses Principales Regions, et ou se peuvent voir l'estendue des Empires, Monarchies, Royaumes, Et Estats qui partagent presentement L'Asie ; Avec Privil. = Asia Divisa In Imperia, Regna & Status In Quae Distribuitur, ad usum serenissimi Burgundiae Ducis"
